info.title: easybill REST API
info.description:
The first version of the easybill REST API. [CHANGELOG](https://api.easybill.de/rest/v1/CHANGELOG.md)

## Authentication

You can choose between two available methods: `Basic Auth` or `Bearer Token`.

In each HTTP request, one of the following HTTP headers is required:

```
# Basic Auth
Authorization: Basic base64_encode('<email>:<api_key>')
# Bearer Token
Authorization: Bearer <api_key>
```

## Limitations

### Request Limit

* PLUS: 10 requests per minute
* BUSINESS: 60 requests per minute

If the limit is exceeded, you will receive the HTTP error: `429 Too Many Requests`

### Result Limit

All result lists are limited to 100 by default. This limit can be increased by the query parameter `limit` to a maximum of 1000.

## Query filter

Many list resources can be filtered. In `/documents` you can filter e.g. by number with `/documents?number=111028654`. If you want to filter multiple numbers, you can either enter them separated by commas `/documents?number=111028654,222006895` or as an array `/documents?number[]=111028654&number[]=222006895`.

**Warning**: The maximum size of an HTTP request line in bytes is 4094. If this limit is exceeded, you will receive the HTTP error: `414 Request-URI Too Large`

### Escape commas in query

You can escape commans in query `name=Patrick\, Peter` if you submit the header `X-Easybill-Escape: true` in your request.

## Property login_id

This is the login of your admin or employee account.

## Date and Date-Time format
Please use the timezone `Europe/Berlin`.
* **date** = *Y-m-d* = `2016-12-31`
* **date-time** = *Y-m-d H:i:s* = `2016-12-31 03:13:37`

Date or datetime can be `null` because the attributes have been added later and the entry is older.

tags.name: discount
tags.description: Discounts for positions and position groups

LIMIT.name: limit
LIMIT.description: Limited the result. Default is 100. Maximum can be 1000.

get.summary: Fetch a list of stock entries for positions

parameters.name: position_id
parameters.description: Filter stock entries by position id.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: Filter stock entries by document id.

post.summary: Create a stock entry for a position

get.summary: Fetch an stock entry for a position

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the stock entry that needs to be fetched

get.summary: Fetch a list of serial numbers for positions

parameters.name: position_id
parameters.description: Filter serial numbers by position id.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: Filter serial numbers by document id.

post.summary: Create s serial number for a position

get.summary: Fetch a serial number for a position

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the serial number that needs to be fetched

delete.summary: Delete a serial number for a position

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the serial number that needs to be deleted

400.description: Serial number in use. Operation failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the login that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Filter customers by group_id. You can add multiple group ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: additional_group_id
parameters.description: Filter customers by additional_group_id. You can add multiple group ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filter customers by number. You can add multiple numbers separate by comma like no,no,no.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Filter customers by country. You can add multiple countries separate by comma like DE,PL,FR.

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: Filter customers by zip_code. You can add multiple zip codes separate by comma like zip,zip,zip.

parameters.name: emails
parameters.description: Filter customers by emails. You can add multiple emails separate by comma like mail,mail,mail.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter customers by first_name. You can add multiple names separate by comma like name,name,name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter customers by first_name. You can add multiple names separate by comma like name,name,name.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Filter customers by first_name. You can add multiple names separate by comma like name,name,name.

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Filter customers by created_at. You can filter one date with created_at=2014-12-10 or between like 2015-01-01,2015-12-31.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of customer that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of customer that needs to be updated

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of customer that needs to be deleted

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of customer that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter discounts by customer_id. You can add multiple customer_ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

get.summary: Fetch specified position discount by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the to be soon updated discount

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the to be soon deleted discount

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter discounts by customer_id. You can add multiple customer_ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

get.summary: Fetch specified position-group discount by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the to be soon updated discount

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the to be soon deleted discount

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter documents by type. Multiple typs seperate with , like type=INVOICE,CREDIT.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter documents by customer_id. You can add multiple customer_is separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Filter documents by project_id. You can add multiple project_id separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: document_date
parameters.description: Filter documents by document_date. You can filter one date with document_date=2014-12-10 or between like 2015-01-01,2015-12-31.

parameters.name: paid_at
parameters.description: Filter documents by paid_at. You can filter one date with paid_at=2014-12-10 or between like 2015-01-01,2015-12-31. With paid_at=null you get all unpaid documents.

parameters.name: cancel_id
parameters.description: Filter documents by cancel_id. You can add multiple ids separate by comma like id,id,id. With cancel_id=null you get all not canceled documents.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter documents by status. Keep in mind that not every document type has a status.

parameters.name: refresh_customer_data
parameters.description: Forces refreshing of the customer data.

get.summary: Download a document as an jpeg-image

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The page of the document where the image should start.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The page of the document where the image should end.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter projects by customer_id. You can add multiple ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Filter positions by number. You can add multiple numbers separate by comma like no,no,no.

parameters.name: login_id
parameters.description: Filter time-tracking by login_id. You can add multiple ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Filter time-tracking by project_id. You can add multiple ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: Filter payments by document_id. You can add multiple ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: payment_at
parameters.description: Filter payments by payment_at. You can filter one date with payment_at=2014-12-10 or between like 2015-01-01,2015-12-31.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Filter payments by reference. You can add multiple references separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: paid
parameters.description: Mark document as paid when amount less then payment amount.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter post boxes by type. Multiple typs seperate with , like type=EMAIL,FAX.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: Filter post boxes by document_id. You can add multiple document ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

parameters.name: document_id
parameters.description: Filter SEPA payment by document_id. You can add multiple ids separate by comma like id,id,id.

acquire_options.description: 1 = Empfehlung eines anderen Kunden, 2 = Zeitungsanzeige, 3 = Eigene Akquisition, 4 = Mitarbeiter Akquisition, 5 = Google, 6 = Gelbe Seiten, 7 = Kostenlose Internet Plattform, 8 = Bezahlte Internet Plattform

delivery_salutation.description: 0 = nothing, 1 = Mr, 2 = Mrs, 3 = Company, 4 = Mr & Mrs, 5 = Married couple, 6 = Family

grace_period.description: will be replaced by its alias due_in_days.

payment_options.description: 1 = Stets pnktliche Zahlung, 2 = berwiegend pnktliche Zahlung, 3 = berwiegend versptete Zahlung, 5 = Grundstzlich versptete Zahlung

salutation.description: 0 = nothing, 1 = Mr, 2 = Mrs, 3 = Company, 4 = Mr & Mrs, 5 = Married couple, 6 = Family

sepa_agreement.description: BASIC = SEPA-Basislastschrift, COR1 = SEPA-Basislastschrift COR1, COMPANY = SEPA-Firmenlastschrift, NULL = Noch kein Mandat erteilt

tax_options.description: nStb = Nicht steuerbar (Drittland), nStbUstID = Nicht steuerbar (EU mit USt-IdNr.), nStbNoneUstID = Nicht steuerbar (EU ohne USt-IdNr.), revc = Steuerschuldwechsel 13b (Inland), IG = Innergemeinschaftliche Lieferung, AL = Ausfuhrlieferung, sStfr = sonstige Steuerbefreiung, NULL = Umsatzsteuerpflichtig

documentPdfType.description: Type of PDF to use when sending a Document to the Customer.

buyer_reference.description: Used as "buyerReference" in ZUGFeRD and as "Leitweg-ID" in the XRechnung format.

foreign_supplier_number.description: The ID given to your company by the customer in his system.

CustomerSnapshot.description: A snapshot of the customer model which belongs to a document. This model is readonly and the state is final after finalization of the document. It's is identical to the state of the customer model at the time of finalization. Updates to the actual customer dataset won't affect this snapshot, however if you update the document the customer and therefore the customer snapshot may reflect a different state.

salutation.description:
0: empty
1: Herrn
2: Frau
3: Firma
4: Herrn und Frau
5: Eheleute
6: Familie

document_note.description: This field can be used in the document text areas with the liquid placeholder {{document.item_notes}}. Every note is only displayed once for every kind of product. This is useful if you want to add something like an instruction.

quantity_str.description: Use quantity_str if you want to set a quantity like: 1:30 h or 3x5 m. quantity_str overwrites quantity.

position.description: Automatic by default (first item: 1, second item: 2, ...)

position_id.description: If set, values are copied from the referenced position

salutation.description:
0: empty
1: Herrn
2: Frau
3: Firma
4: Herrn und Frau
5: Eheleute
6: Familie

end_date_or_count.description: Date of last exectution day or number of times to exectute

paid_date_option.description: Option is used to determine what date is used for the payment if is_paid is true. "next_valid_date" selects the next workday in regards to the created date of the document if the date falls on a saturday or sunday.

target_type.description: The document type that will be generated. Can not be changed on existing documents.

type.description:
With DEFAULT no other fields are required and this message will be printed: 'Invoice date coincides with the time of supply'.
For SERVICE or DELIVERY exactly one of the following fields must be set: date, date_from and date_to or text.

address.description: This information comes from the customer which can be set with customer_id.

label_address.description: This information comes from the customer which can be set with customer_id.

cancel_id.description: ID from the cancel document. Only for document type INVOICE.

due_date.description: To change the value use grace_period.

grace_period.description: will be replaced by its alias due_in_days.

is_draft.description: This property is read only. To finish the document call /documents/{id}/done.

is_replica.description: Marks a document as a replica from another software.

is_cold.description: Indicates if a document is in the long term archive

is_oss.description: Indicates if a document is a one-stop-shop document

coldstorage_due_date.description: Signals when the document should be moved to the long term archive

item_notes.description: Field holds all unique document_note of items for the document

login_id.description: If omitted or null, the currently active login is used.

pdf_template.description: Default template is null or 'DE', default english is 'EN' and for all others use the numeric template ID.

recurring_options.description: This object is only available in document type RECURRING

service_date.description: This object is only available in document type INVOICE or CREDIT.

status.description: This value can only be used in document type DELIVERY, ORDER, CHARGE or OFFER. NULL is default = not set.

text.example:
Vielen Dank fr Ihren Auftrag!

Bitte begleichen Sie den offenen Betrag bis zum %DOKUMENT.DATUM-FAELLIG%.

Mit freundlichen Gren

%FIRMA.FIRMA%

text_prefix.example:
%KUNDE.ANREDE%,
nachfolgend berechnen wir Ihnen wie vorab besprochen:

text_tax.description: Overwrites the default vat-option text from the document layout. It is only displayed in documents with the type other than: Delivery, Dunning, Reminder or Letter and a different vat-option than null

use_shipping_address.description: If true and customer has shipping address then it will be used.

vat_option.description:
NULL: Normal steuerbar
nStb: Nicht steuerbar (Drittland)
nStbUstID: Nicht steuerbar (EU mit USt-IdNr.)
nStbNoneUstID: Nicht steuerbar (EU ohne USt-IdNr.)
nStbIm: Nicht steuerbarer Innenumsatz
revc: Steuerschuldwechsel 13b (Inland)
IG: Innergemeinschaftliche Lieferung
AL: Ausfuhrlieferung
sStfr: sonstige Steuerbefreiung
smallBusiness: Kleinunternehmen (Keine MwSt.)

category_custom.description: The name of your custom category. Can only have a value if "category" is "CUSTOM".

finish_at.description: The time when the task was marked as done

login_id.description: When omitted or null, the currently active login is used

budget_time.description: Time budget in minutes (e.g. "90" = 1 hour and 30 minutes)

login_id.description: If omitted or null, the currently active login is used

document_note.description: This field can be used in the document text areas with the liquid placeholder {{document.item_notes}}. Every note is only displayed once for every kind of product. This is useful if you want to add something like an instruction.

export_identifier.description: The FAS-Account is the four-digit revenue account, in which the revenue will be entered when doing the export to your tax consultant. In case you want to split your revenue to several revenue accounts, please talk to your tax consultant before, to guarantee an unobstructed use of the interface. For every revenue element, there are number ranges, which can be used. Please avoid using combinations of numbers, which can not be used by your tax consultant.

sale_price2.description: Price for customers of group 2 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price3.description: Price for customers of group 3 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price4.description: Price for customers of group 4 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price5.description: Price for customers of group 5 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price6.description: Price for customers of group 6 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price7.description: Price for customers of group 7 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price8.description: Price for customers of group 8 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price9.description: Price for customers of group 9 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

sale_price10.description: Price for customers of group 10 in cents (e.g. "150" = 1.50)

stock.description: Activates stock management for this position

stock_limit_notify.description: Notify when stock_count is lower than stock_limit

stock_limit_notify_frequency.description: Notify frequency when stock_count is lower than stock_limit (ALWAYS, ONCE)

quantity.description: Used as the default quantity when adding this position to a document

login_id.description: If omitted or null, the currently active login is used.

text.example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua.

Attachment.description: If customer_id, project_id and document_id are null, the attachment has a global context and is accessible from the web ui. Keep in mind only to provide one of the four context. You can't attach a file to several context in one request. A error is thrown if you provide two or more context (i. E. sending customer_id, document_id and project_id in combination).

document_file_type.description: When set to null, the setting on the customer is used

post_send_type.description:
This value indicates what method is used when the document is send via mail.
The different types are offered by the german post as additional services.
The registered mail options will include a tracking number which will be 
added to the postbox when known.

If the value is omitted or empty when a postbox is created with the type "POST"
post_send_type_standard will be used.

For postbox with a different type than "POST" this field will hold a empty string.

This value indicates what method is used when the document is send via mail.
The different types are offered by the german post as additional services.
The registered mail options will include a tracking number which will be 
added to the postbox when known.

If the value is omitted or empty when a postbox is created with the type "POST"
post_send_type_standard will be used.

For postbox with a different type than "POST" this field will hold a empty string.

tracking_identifier.description:
If the document is send with one of the registered send types stated for post_send_type, a tracking identifier
will be added to the postbox at a later point when the tracking identifier is provided
by our service partner.

creditor_bic.description: If type is DEBIT, this field is overwritten with the selected bank account data on export.

creditor_iban.description: Mandatory if type is CREDIT. If type is DEBIT, this field is overwritten with the selected bank account data on export.

creditor_name.description: Mandatory if type is CREDIT. If type is DEBIT, this field is overwritten with the selected bank account data on export.

debitor_bic.description: If type is CREDIT, this field is overwritten with the selected bank account data on export.

debitor_iban.description: Mandatory if type is DEBIT. If type is CREDIT, this field is overwritten with the selected bank account data on export.

debitor_name.description: Mandatory if type is DEBIT. If type is CREDIT, this field is overwritten with the selected bank account data on export.

debitor_address_line_1.description: Mandatory if type is DEBIT and the debitor's IBAN belongs to a country outside the EEA

debitor_country.description: Mandatory if type is DEBIT and the debitor's IBAN belongs to a country outside the EEA

export_at.description: If a date is set, this record is marked as exported

local_instrument.description:
CORE: SEPA Core Direct Debit
COR1: SEPA-Basislastschrift COR1
B2B: SEPA Business to Business Direct Debit

sequence_type.description:
FRST: Erstlastschrift
RCUR: Folgelastschrift
OOFF: Einmallastschrift
FNAL: Letztmalige Lastschrift

discount_type.description:
AMOUNT subtracts the value in "discount" from the total
QUANTITY subtracts the value in "discount" multiplied by quantity
PERCENT uses the value in "discount" as a percentage
FIX sets the value in "discount" as the new price

note.example: Correction for stock count of the Entry from 11/01/2017

LoginSecurity.description: This object is only displayed if your request the login resource as an admin. Otherwise this property will be null.

two_factor_enabled.description: Shows if the login has two factor enabled for the login process

recovery_codes_enabled.description: Shows if the login has recovery codes enabled to bypass two factor

notify_on_new_login_enabled.description: Shows if the login has enabled to be notified if a new login is made from an unknown device.
